original_title: Sri Lanka stocks close down, interest in Melstacorp
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka stocks closed down on Thursday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The All Share Price Index was down 0.24 percent, or 25.23 points, at 10,522.
The S&P SL20 index of liquid stocks was down 0.06 percent, or 1.68 points at 2,979.
Turnover was at 812 million. Melstacorp Plc (up at 77.50) made up 364 million of this.
Top contributors to the ASPI included Access Engineering Plc (up at 18.10), and Commercial Bank of Ceylon Plc (up at 85.00).
There was a net foreign inflow of 391 million. (Colombo/Nov23/2023)
